exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables A1, plusA, invA, minusA, multA, divA, eqA_dec, ltM_dec, a, Q, p, q, s.

ctx: intros Q a q nZa Hcan1 HinPoly Hcan2 HdivPp r Hcan3 HdivPp2 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n q : list (Term A n) nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Hcan1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinPoly : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) Q Hcan2 : list (Term A n) HdivPp : canonical A0 eqA ltM Hcan2 r : divPp a Hcan2 Hcan3 : list (Term A n) HdivPp2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM Hcan3 Hincl : incl Hcan2 Hcan3 Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM Hcan3" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q Hcan3 (Rminus a nZa Hcan3 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) Hcan2)".

original: intros Q a q nZa Hcan1 HinPoly Hcan2 HdivPp r Hcan3 HdivPp2 Hincl. apply reduceplus_mults_invf0 in HdivPp2. apply HdivPp2; auto.
